participant_1.background:
I try to spend as much time with my dogs as possible.
I went to the seaside for a walk and read a book on my last birthday.
I am not close with my family, but I am close to my friends and the people I volunteer with.

participant_2.background:
My daily routine is pretty relaxed as I'm taking a year off before college, but I like to make sure I keep busy and get some reading in on the weekends.
i never learned how to drive.
I am a teacher who is engaged to a man that my family does not approve of
i like rollerblading.
I'm a single night owl who enjoys my work.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well! I'm taking a year off before college, so my daily routine is pretty relaxed. I like to make sure I keep busy, though, and get some reading in on the weekends. How about you?
I'm doing great, thanks! I'm an engineer, and I really enjoy my work. I'm also not close with my family, but I'm close to my friends and the people I volunteer with.
That's great! I'm glad you enjoy your work. I'm a teacher, and I love my job. I'm also engaged to a man that my family doesn't approve of, but we're happy together.
That's awesome! I'm happy for you. I'm not close with my family either, but I'm close to my friends and the people I volunteer with. I like to spend as much time with my dogs as possible.
That's great! I love animals. I have a cat, but I've always wanted a dog. I went to the seaside for a walk and read a book on my last birthday. What did you do?
That sounds like a great way to spend your birthday! I went to the park with my dogs and read a book. I love spending time in the outdoors.
That sounds really nice. I love being outside, too. I like to go rollerblading when the weather is nice.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to learn how to rollerblade. I'm not sure I'd be very good at it, though.
It's not too hard to learn! I took a few lessons when I was younger, and I've been rollerblading ever since. It's a lot of fun.
I might have to give it a try sometime. Thanks for the tip!
